name: Night at the Circus
description:
This game was made by AcridDragoon (the programmer) and HashCarv (the artist) for the Scream Jam 2020. We hope that you guys  enjoy playing it as much as we enjoyed making it!

Sadly we do not have someone who does sound design so the sound design in this game is not great :\ (I tried my best)

Your motive is to escape the circus before the timer runs out. once it runs out, the clown will come and get you.
